name: Achtung Panza!
overview: Achtung Panza! is an up to three way tank combat game, viewed from a top down perspective. Moving the joystick left/right rotates the gun of your tank, pushing forward will turn the tank to face where the gun is pointed then move. All three tanks share a field with plenty of obstacles that will absorb shots as you try to shoot the other tanks. There is unlimited ammo but each tank has a finite health and can only take so many hits.
